creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: In this Report, we acknowledge our “leadership’s” desire for continuous congratulations. We see your “accomplishments, ” and we will never forget what you have done.
title: April 9, 2020: Congratulations!
